replies.body:
**Oh hey Quinn on sale. Guess that means it time to promote my Quinn topic I made:** http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/YK1MaKqW-quinn-is-fine-after-her-bugs-are-fixed-of-course-valor-on-the-other-hand


**But now back to the story. **

{{champion:41}} Ok I think I have gotten most of my strength back. Who's left for interviews? 

{{champion:18}} Me. 

{{champion:68}} Yo. 

{{champion:41}} Wait wasn't there another guy? Kinda purple with tattoos all over him?

{{champion:18}} He left. 

{{champion:41}} WHAT!?

{{champion:68}} Said something about "Having to go back to being a professor." 

{{champion:18}} He did say he would be back in October. 

{{champion:41}} I am not waiting for October for that guy to decide to be a pirate again. Let's continue the interview with you. 

{{champion:68}} Sweet. I pilot this awesome machine that I made myself. It can shoot fire, harpoons, missiles, and I can hit people with it. 

{{champion:41}} But does it actually work? 

{{champion:68}} Yeah watch this. 

_flamethrower_

{{champion:41}} ............

{{champion:68}} Oops. Didn't mean to hit you. 

{{champion:41}} ........_gunfire_

{{champion:68}} NO! The stabilizer knee joint! Why did you shoot it?

{{champion:41}} That's going to happen a lot on my ship. Let's see if you can fix it. 

{{champion:68}} :(

{{champion:41}} Last one. Are you ready? 

{{champion:18}} Always.
Well there goes my ending. Now I have to go with ending #2.

D: I'm sorry! I have soiled the good name of story telling!
SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT! SOILED IT!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GfiGyhfQeLI
I'll delete my comment for what I have done
Hopefully not many people saw it.
I wanna see it now :L
Forgiveness?
Really dude - SPOILER ALERT!
It is a good thing I came in after.....{{champion:34}}
Way to go
Its so cool that {{champion:68}} can invite awesome machines all by himself. :P If only he could invent one.
I blame sleep.

"A Flaw in the Code" Part 8
Come one, come all. Summoners please hear.
The truth about Riot is finally clear.
But first to understand, realize, comprehend
I must say the beginning, the middle, then end

Tahm left the three friends alone in the room
But as he walked out, they heard a huge BOOM
He scrambled back in and looked all around
Whatever he looked for seemed not to be found

He left once again, the three were confused
Against all these powers, how could they not lose?
Then from between them, from someone unseen
"Follow me friends. I'm on your team."

From nowhere, appeared {{champion:17}}  the yordle
Riots creation- evil, immortal
He sprinted away through an exit back door
The three were reluctant, remembering his lore

But follow they did, and soon they came to 
A gold-purple portal that they all traveled through
A magical journey- but where did they go?
A house in a wintry place full of snow

They all rushed inside to hid from the hail
My friend, I will see you next Summoner's Sale
